channel.title: Translated Air Alert UA
channel.description: Translated Alerts from Air Alert UA

item.title: 游댮 20:13 The threat of shelling! Now in the Chervonohrigor Territorial Community Artillery Fire.
item.description: 游댮 20:13 The threat of shelling! Now in the Chervonohrigor Territorial Community Artillery Fire. This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.

item.title: 游리 20:13 Flashing anxiety in Dnipropetrovsk region. Consider, anxiety is still in:- Manganese and Marganets Territorial Community
item.description: 游리 20:13 Flashing anxiety in Dnipropetrovsk region. Consider, anxiety is still in:- Manganese and Marganets Territorial Community#Dnepropetrovsk_. This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.
